newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Light still a Fator hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Light still a Fator hold.

text.p: -- Fator Securities said it was maintaining its hold rating on Brazilian private power utility Light.
-- It said in a report that "even though Light has performed well since it was privatized, we believe its stock has reached a fair price."
-- "We are waiting for more details about the company's investment program before modifying our recommendation," it added.
-- The company reported a net income of 81.2 million reais in the first quarter, 28.6 percent above Fator's forecasts, it said.
-- Light shares were up 0.77 percent to 519 reais earlier on the Sao Paulo bourse.
